shows.title: Prophecy, AI, & the Supernatural / Alien Control System
shows.first_half: First Half: Daniel Holdings is an Air Force vet, businessman, and author as well as a radio show commentator, podcaster, public speaker, and documentary film writer. He'll discuss the quantum connection between our physical world and the supernatural realm, as well as artificial intelligence, current events, and biblical prophecy.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Actor, director, and producer Thomas Jane will discuss the theories of Jacques Vallée and what an alien control system might look like here on Earth. He'll speculate on the possibility of a non-local alien information network, its limits, its powers, and its purpose.

shows.title: Elvis Presley Revelations / Stonehenge Mysteries
shows.first_half: First Half: August 16th, 2025, marks the 48th anniversary of the death of the 'King of Rock' n’ Roll,' Elvis Presley. Journalist Ivor Davis will discuss Elvis, his career, his performances, Graceland, and his lifestyle. He'll also talk about Elvis' relationship to the Mafia and Colonel Parker.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Maria Wheatley is a master dowser and researcher of ancient sites. She'll unravel the mysteries of Stonehenge and the healing power of the stones. She'll also discuss the lost civilization of the elongated skull people and reveal the secrets of the Templars and their use of ley lines.

shows.title: Digital Identity / Bigfoot Lore
shows.first_half: First Half: USC Professor Bart Kosko will discuss digital identity as we approach the AI age of brain-chip implants and brain uploads, as well as the transition from brain tissue to digital processors. He believes digital privacy laws are too lax and will not prevent lawyers from subpoenaing digital memories and intentions.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Author, engineer, and singer Michael Kozlowski has written books in the horror fiction and paranormal investigation genres. He'll talk about possible origins of Bigfoot and evidence for its existence, and explain how the creature may be related to various legends and folklore.

shows.title: Space News / Power of Aliveness
shows.first_half: First Half: David Livingston is the founder and host of the Space Show, a live internet educational talk show program. He'll talk about the Artemis program and the state of the Lunar Landing mission. He'll also report on refueling in orbit, Starship testing, life support, and more.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Inspirational author Kate Manser has spent the past decade studying transcendence, meaning, and what makes us live and die happy. She'll discuss a hidden superpower of aliveness that humans possess, and what it means to be aware of being alive, and how we can tap into that feeling.

shows.title: Jim Morrison, Mystic Visionary / Open Lines
shows.first_half: Author Paul Wyld joins guest host Richard Syrett to reveal a different side of The Doors' late frontman, Jim Morrison, whom he characterizes as a mystical figure and shamanic visionary whose influence extended beyond rock music and into the heart of the Western esoteric tradition. Followed by Open Lines. Give Richard a call and discuss whatever is on your mind!
